thread.title: Tottenham transfer news: Spurs to rival Arsenal for ‘new Thierry Henry’ Kylian Mbappe
thread.title_full: Tottenham transfer news: Spurs to rival Arsenal for ‘new Thierry Henry’ Kylian Mbappe

author: jgordon
title: Tottenham transfer news: Spurs to rival Arsenal for ‘new Thierry Henry’ Kylian Mbappe
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments TOTTENHAM will try to beat Arsenal to the ‘new Thierry Henry’ Kylian Mbappe after he scored a brilliant hat-trick. 
The promising young striker continued his run of form by netting three goals as Monaco demolished Metz. Getty Images 4 Kylian Mbappe scored a hat-trick as Monaco demolished Metz to catch the eye of Tottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino 
Better to shoot for the moon – if you fail, you fall on a cloud. I’ll try to make sure you do not forget my name Kylian Mbappe 
He has already caught the eye of Wenger – who accepts the Henry comparison – and The Mirror claims Mauricio Pochettino will join the hunt. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Mbappe, 18, extended his Monaco deal until 2019 last season but the Ligue 1 leaders are bracing themselves for a flurry of offers in the summer. 
Wenger admitted his interest the the France Under-19s international , who he tried to sign over the summer, earlier this month. 
The Frenchman told the Ligue 1 show: “He is not exactly Thierry Henry but it is true that he has similar qualities and the future and talent is similar. Related Stories Va Va Voom 'New Thierry Henry' Kylian Mbappe nets hat-trick as Monaco retain top spot with crushing 5-0 win over Metz Knocked mbappe Arsene Wenger compares Kylian Mbappe to Thierry Henry... but admits he snubbed Arsenal last summer 'THE NEW HENRY' Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger admits he is tracking Monaco wonderkid Kylian Mbappe LIGUE WONDER BOY French football's new star Kylian Mbappe is ready to rip Spurs apart after comparisons to Thierry Henry THE NEXT MARTIAL? Who is Kylian Mbappe - the £35million Monaco wonderkid who Manchester City tried to buy? 
“The potential is similar, after that if he has the same level of motivation, desire and intelligence that Thierry has, and the next two to three years will tell us that, then he can be very promising. 
“The guys that have super talent are already playing at 18. Those who are not playing at 18 or 19 do not have that exceptional talent and he does play over here at the top level. 
“He is a guy who is electric like Thierry was, can dribble, can pass and is efficient. 
“We follow him, we know him very well, and he is developing well. He could be another Thierry Henry.” AP:Associated Press Mbappe has had a similar rise up the ranks at Monaco to Arsenal legend Thierry Henry Getty Images Mbappe has been largely used as a super-sub this season for Monaco and has taken his opportunities off the bench Getty Images 4 Mbappe has blistering speed and strength beyond his years which he deploys to good use 
Mbappe had trials with Chelsea and Real Madrid as a youngster before Monaco managed to steal a march on Europe’s big guns. 
He is regarded as the brightest recent product of an academy which included Manchester United star Anthony Martial as one of its graduates. 
After signing a deal with Nike, Mbappe – dubbed ‘little Robinho’ at Clairefontaine – made his ambitions clear. 
He said: “I want to win the Ballon d’Or. 
“Better to shoot for the moon – if you fail, you fall on a cloud. I’ll try to make sure you do not forget my name.” Watch Ryan Giggs and Thierry Henry star in this classic Reebok advert from 2009
